item.description:
CASH GAME


Stakes: 1/1 NL
Min Buyin: $30
Max Buyin: $200 (or largest stack @ table)

Bad Beat Jackpot: $275, qualifier is losing with 7's full

About the Bad Beat Jackpot:

$1 is taken from each pot with at least $20 in it to fund the BBJ.

Players must use both holecards to qualify their hands.  Players must have a pair in their hand that makes any qualifying full house or quad's.

Loser of the hand wins 50% of the jackpot, winner gets 25% and everyone else who played that night (even if you already went home) shares the remaining 25%

The qualifier starts at quad 2's, and each week drops (Aces Full, Kings Full, etc) until the BBJ is hit or until it reaches an Ace-high flush, where it remains until it's hit.

Eats: Pizza by 6:45pm, water, soda and snacks provided. Extra
fridge if you want to BYOB.


Note: Cash game has a dedicated dealer, tips are accepted and appreciated!

OTHER NOTES


- smoking at the bottom stairs of the deck please (will have a can there for butts)
- coats can go on the back of your chair (not on couch please)
- we have cats in case you suffer from allergies!
- you may wear your shoes inside, we'll swiffer the floors after the event

 

ADDRESS


2 Omelia Rd, East Windsor

Anthony's Home Phone:  860-292-8983
Anthony's Cell Phone:  860-597-3776


- house is on the corner of a four-way intersection with Rye Street. Big brick building, large yard. Driveway is between the yellow fire hydrant and the mailbox (there's also a bench by the tree next to the mailbox)  Please park near my silver Camry.  Come in through side door at deck!
item.how_to_find_us: House on corner of four-way intersection. Brick building, huge yard. Driveway between mailbox and yellow fire hydrant

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: 1/1 NL Texas Hold Em Cash Game @ Anthony's
